meanings.definition: A vehicle with three wheels, typically used by children.
meanings.sent1: The red tricycle was parked outside the house.
meanings.sent2: Children love to ride their tricycles in the park.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended her tricycle was a magical chariot.
meanings.sent4: His tricycle of ideas led him to a brilliant invention.
meanings.sent5: The tricycle's bright colors made it easy to spot in the playground.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a tricycle.
meanings.sent1: She learned to tricycle when she was just three years old.
meanings.sent2: I tricycle to work every morning for some exercise.
meanings.sent3: He tricycled around the park, feeling the wind in his hair.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts tricycled back to the carefree days of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The idea tricycled in his mind until he finally understood it.
